sentences.english: Banks are reducing their dependence on wholesale funding and increasing their reliance on "stickier" deposits.

sentences.english: Wholesalers and retailers are ways that manufacturers get their products to a specific group of people.

sentences.english: I intend to continue to use the next round of loans in order to expand the size of the wholesale department.
